evidence.claim: SILVERcare utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
They have expertise in HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive information.
The company leverages HL7 and FHIR standards for healthcare data interchange.
SILVERcare implements EDI X12 for billing and transaction processing.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses EDI X12 and APIs, indicating a strong fit for healthcare data exchange.
